titles.title: Providing for consideration of the Senate amendment to the bill (H.R. 3055) making appropriations for the Departments of Commerce and Justice, Science, and Related Agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2020, and for other purposes.

Providing for consideration of the Senate amendment to the bill (H.R. 3055) making appropriations for the Departments of Commerce and Justice, Science, and Related Agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2020, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 116-297, by Mr. McGovern.

The resolution makes in order a motion that the House concur in the Senate amendment with an amendment inserting the text of Rules Committee Print 116-38, in lieu of the matter proposed to be inserted by the Senate.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 54.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 708.

POSTPONED PROCEEDINGS - At the conclusion of debate on H. Res. 708, the Chair put the question on ordering the previous question and by voice vote, announced the ayes had prevailed. Mr. Cole demanded the yeas and nays and the Chair postponed further proceedings on ordering the previous question on H. Res. 708 until later in the legislative day.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 228 - 192 (Roll no. 628).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 230 - 194 (Roll no. 629).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: This resolution sets forth the rule for consideration of the Senate amendment to H.R. 3055 (Further Continuing Appropriations Act, 2020, and Further Health Extenders Act of 2019).
